subject: Basketball
Stadiums and Arenas
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: This season, the SuperSonics have dealt with the longest single-season losing streak in team history, a dispute with the city of Seattle and the threat of relocation to Oklahoma City.
snippet: This season, the SuperSonics have dealt with the longest single-season losing streak in team history, a dispute with the city of Seattle and the threat of relocation to Oklahoma City.
